title: IAA Tonight | Damian Lillard Secured the Bag
description: Damian Lillard has agreed to two-year, $122 million contract extension with the Portland Trail Blazers that will tie him to the franchise through the 2026-27 season. Brandon Marshall, Auntie Chantel Tremitiere and Ashley Nicole Moss discuss if Dame will remain in Portland for the entire duration of his contract, and what does it mean for his legacy if he never wins a championship with the Blazers.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Auntie Chantel Tremitiere, Ashley Nicole Moss)
